itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway make their picks for the NBA and NHL Finals, wonder why Lakers GM Rob Pelinka lied about Kobe Bryant meeting Heath Ledger, why we want mor violence in the MLB, how Lebron James kid is set up for failure in the NBA, and why...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway make their picks for the NBA and NHL Finals, wonder why Lakers GM Rob Pelinka lied about Kobe Bryant meeting Heath Ledger, why we want mor violence in the MLB, how Lebron James kid is set up for failure in the NBA, and why the Oakland Raiders signing Richie Incognito is a death wish.
